title: A speech made by the Right Honourable George Earl of Berkeley to the Levant company at their annual election, February ix, MDCLXXX His Lordship being governour of that most loyal society.
author: Berkeley, George Berkeley, Earl of, 1628-1698.
notes: On verso of leaf preceding t.p.: a letter to the printer, dated: March 5, 1680.  Signed: B. C.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
